name: R. L. Burnside
description: '''R. L. Burnside''' (November 23, 1926 â€“ September 1, 2005) was an American [[Hill country blues|Hill country]] [[blues]] singer, songwriter, and guitarist. He played music for most of his life but received little recognition until 1995 when Burnside recorded and toured with [[Jon Spencer]], garnering [[Crossover music|crossover]] appeal and introducing his music to a new fan base, particularly in the [[Punk rock|punk]] and [[garage rock]] scenes.
